text: â€œNdithudi, Allah sakhululuka (uchimo) womphatikiza ndi chinthu china, (pochiyesa kuti ndi mnzake wa Allah). Koma Iye amakhululukira machimo ena omwe sali amenewo kwa yemwe wamfuna. Ndipo yemwe angamphatikize Allah (ndi milungu yabodza), ndithudi, wasokera kusokera konka nako kutali (ndi njira yachoonadi)
